thread.title: Christopher Duthie

author: Christopher Duthie
title: Christopher Duthie
text: Considering I rung all the local companies, nationally known brands and also my break down company and no one could offer a service for a couple of days, I wasn't holding out much hope but I was pleasantly surprised, fast, efficient service and even with the surcharge for a specific time the next day it still worked out cheaper than all other options. Would recommend and will definitely use again if required!
